reviewText: Would give 5 stars but Apollo 18 won't play

I love scary movies, and this contained everything I wanted! I loved "Let Me In" , "The Crazies" , "Apollo 18" , etc. This 4 disc collection arrived quicker than was stated, and in perfect condition. The seller was great and maintains good standing with its reviews.
Get condition,nice price for the 4 disk set.came on time ...I can't complain.my favorite of the 4 is the crazies.
never saw any of these movies before and was glad to see them together in an inexpensive set.
Disappointing horror, slasher, and SF -- others done better.  Audio and video quality were better than average, though Apollo 18 had some intentional defect.
New and great movies, perfect birthday gift
This is an ok selection, but not the most exciting selection of modern horror films.  Crazies was my favorite selection of the four.
These are on separate DVDs, a plus for me. I'd say;  Let me in is really good, Pandorum was almost very good. Apollo 18 was just okay, and Crazies was good,
